institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal human resource development support project operation rules/Article 29 (Recovery and return of support funds)
contents: Article 29 (Recovery and Return of Subsidy) ① The Chairman may differentially provide support funds to supported companies according to the results of the performance evaluation. ② In order to ensure transparency in the execution of project expenses, the chairman of the board must select an external accounting agency to conduct an audit of the accounting for the current year. ③ When the project period ends or the project is abandoned, the supporting company shall determine the inappropriate execution amount, execution balance of support funds, and obligor burden rate. The subsidy recovery amount corresponding to the ratio falling below must be settled and returned., ④ If the supporting company discontinues the business before the end of the business period for reasons other than fraud, the subsidy has been executed in accordance with the business purpose and has already been established. If a facility or equipment is used for autonomous learning activities until the end of the original business period, already executed support funds may not be returned., ⑤ If a supporting company receives support funds through an illegal method, the Chairman of the Board may take sanctions such as recovery of the support funds. must be taken. The reasons for recovery of support funds based on restrictions such as fraud are determined separately by the chairman. ⑥ In cases where the supported company suspends business before the end of the business period due to bankruptcy, closure of business, court receivership, or similar circumstances, recovery of support funds is practically impossible. In this case, recovery may be postponed., ⑦ If the head of the affiliated institution wishes to recover the support fund in accordance with the provisions of paragraphs 3 to 6, the head of the affiliated institution shall confirm the amount to be returned by verifying supporting documents up to the time of occurrence of the cause, etc. and the supporting company shall The deposit must be made to the return account., ⑧ Details regarding the recovery of support funds due to suspension of support, etc. shall be separately determined by the chairman of the board.
